_sText:
This is an update/changed version of the ZH map.

I have adapted this for zombiemod, so there would less ppl asking why there is no buyzone for terrorists, and couldn't be used for ZM

-Added a buyzone for terrorists
-Removed the main closing door
-removed part of the barbed fence so terrorists can run through
-made more objects physics

this should now be playable for ZM, so enjoy!
